en: My seat is on the second row from the front, in class 3-C.
zh_TW: 我的位子在前面數來第二排，3-C 教室。

en: Maybe you don't suck as much as I thought.
zh_TW: 也許妳沒我想的那麼爛。

en: I'm surprised you even gave it back. Maybe I misjudged you.
zh_TW: 我很意外妳會還給我。我錯怪妳了。

en: I bet you think you're SO funny. We have other plans for the night anyway.
zh_TW: 妳一定覺得妳自己很有趣。反正我們今晚還有別的計劃。

en: Don't talk to me anymore. I won't forget this.
zh_TW: 別再跟我說話了。我記住妳了。

en: (She's really concentrated on fixing her ribbon. Best not to disturb her.)
zh_TW: (她真的很專心地在弄她的緞帶。最好別打擾她。)

en: (She's angrily fidgeting with her ribbon. Best not to bother her anymore.)
zh_TW: (她很生氣地在翻弄她的緞帶。最好別再打擾她了。)

en: It's good to finally make some new friends.
zh_TW: 能交到新朋友真是太好了。

en: Why not? I'll pick it up before going home.
zh_TW: 何不？我回家前再回來拿。

en: Um... why is there lettuce in your bag?
zh_TW: 呃…為什麼妳的書包裡有萵苣？

en: Wha- WHAT DID I JUST SAY!?
So... why is there lettuce in your bag?
zh_TW: 所以…為什麼妳的書包裡有萵苣？

en: My mom asked me to pick it up on the way home, okay?
zh_TW: 我媽要我在回家路上買的，可以嗎？

en: Is someone else here with us?
Hopefully it was just the janitor and you can get it back on Monday.
zh_TW: 希望只是校工，這樣妳星期一就能拿回來了。

en: Isn't this stuffed crow just so cool?
zh_TW: 這個填充烏鴉是不是很酷？

en: It was an accident! And what is that supposed to mean anyways!?
zh_TW: 這只是意外！還有妳這是什麼意思！？

en: It's okay, you can just apologize next week.
zh_TW: 沒關係，妳可以下星期再道歉。

en: Yeah, it's okay. It was probably the only valuable thing in this room anyways.
zh_TW: 是啊，沒關係。這大概是這房間裡唯一值錢的東西。

en: Say, what ARE you doing here? Visiting the school at night is hardly normal no matter what you're looking for.
zh_TW: 是說，妳在這裡做什麼？不管妳在找什麼，在晚上來學校可不正常。

en: I could ask you the same question.
zh_TW: 我也可以問妳同一個問題。

en: You already know what we were doing.
zh_TW: 妳已經知道我們剛剛在做什麼了。

en: Truth is, I'm doing the same thing as you girls... But it's spookier than your game.
zh_TW: 事實上，我也跟妳們在做一樣的是…只是我的比妳們的遊戲還要更恐怖。

en: A game? Can we join in?
zh_TW: 遊戲？我們也可以加入嗎？

en: I thought you had plans for the night?
zh_TW: 我以為妳們今晚已經有計劃了？

en: We can probably spare an hour or two.
zh_TW: 我們大概可以分個一兩小時出來。

en: In any case, it's a one-person ritual, so you can't join me on it.
zh_TW: 無論如何，這是單人儀式，所以妳們不能加入。

en: If you like this kind of occult stuff, why aren't you in the club?
zh_TW: 如果妳喜歡這種超自然事物，為什麼不加入社團？

en: You didn't bring any other games? Not even a deck of cards?
zh_TW: 妳們沒有帶其他遊戲來？連撲克牌都沒有？

en: We didn't anticipate someone ruining our game.
zh_TW: 我們沒想到有人會來破壞我們的遊戲。

en: So, how did you get in here?
zh_TW: 所以，妳們是怎麼進來的？

en: We got a key from someone.
zh_TW: 我們從某人那邊拿到鑰匙。

en: Couldn't you just have joined the club?
zh_TW: 妳們加入社團不就好了？

en: Why? Is that what you did? Join the club just for the key?
zh_TW: 為什麼？妳是這麼做的嗎？只為了拿到鑰匙就加入社團？
…這對話走向跟我想的不一樣。

en: What were you looking for earlier?
Shouldn't you have gathered them ahead of time?
zh_TW: 妳不是應該預先收集好嗎？

en: Now that's boring. Do you also do your homework ahead of time?
zh_TW: 這樣很無聊。妳還會預先寫好功課嗎？

en: I don't know what to say to that.
Will you at least tell us more about your game?
zh_TW: 至少告訴我們妳遊戲的內容吧？

en: I'll let you know how it went on Monday.
zh_TW: 我星期一再告訴妳們結果。

en: If it's anything like the rest I tried, it won't really do anything.
zh_TW: 如果這跟我其他試過的儀式一樣，那麼會沒什麼用。

en: What's with all the chit chat? Are we suddenly friends or something?
zh_TW: 是在閒聊什麼？我們突然變成朋友了還是怎樣？
可是她毀了我們的活動！

en: Nice to meet you then, I'm Kat.
zh_TW: 那麼，很高興認識妳們，我是凱特。

en: I'm Juli. This is Saki, and this is Kaya.
zh_TW: 我是由里。她是沙紀。她是香耶。

en: You know, you're quite the celebrity among third year students.
zh_TW: 妳知道嗎，妳在三年級中很有名。

en: You should hang out at 3-C sometime.
Do you um... need help with that ribbon?
zh_TW: 妳需要，嗯…幫妳弄好鍛帶嗎？

en: Don't mind Saki. She's not the bitch she pretends to be.
zh_TW: 別在意沙紀。她沒有她裝起來的那麼婊。

en: We will probably go home soon.
zh_TW: 我們大概等等就回家了。

en: Well... at least I got what I needed.
zh_TW: 好吧…至少我拿到我要的東西了。

en: This was the most pointless thing you've done today.
zh_TW: 這是妳今天做過最沒有意義的事情。

en: My masterpiece is already perfect, no need for modifications.
zh_TW: 我的傑作已經很完美了，不需要再做修改。

en: Is that supposed to be you...?
Please never draw a portrait of me.
Kindergarten called, they want their drawing skills back.
zh_TW: 幼稚園打來了，要妳把他們的繪畫能力還回去。

en: This is my depiction of a child's depiction of a house.
zh_TW: 這是我對小孩詮釋房子的詮釋。

en: I expected a bit better from you...
Say, are any of you members of the theater club?
zh_TW: 是說，妳們有人是話劇社員嗎？

en: Well, there's a talent agent waiting outside. He's only interested in teenage girls with a passion for roleplaying, though.
zh_TW: 外面有個才藝經紀人在等著。他只對表演有熱忱的青少女有興趣。

en: What is it that you want?
I just need to borrow something from your club room. You have the key with you, don't you?
zh_TW: 我只需要從妳們社辦借個東西。妳有鑰匙，對吧？

en: Fine, you can have it... If you can do me a favor first.
zh_TW: 好吧，可以給妳…如果妳先幫我個忙。

en: I'll do you a favor: I'll conveniently forget to tell the principal that you three broke into the school at night. Deal?
zh_TW: 我幫妳個忙：我會很巧地忘記告訴校長妳們三個晚上闖進學校，如何？

en: So, what's the favor you need?
Get my notebook. It's in classroom 3-C, under my desk.
zh_TW: 把我的筆記本拿來。它在 3-C 教室，我的桌子下。

en: A red notebook that the girl with the ponytail forgot. She probably wants it back.
zh_TW: 一本紅色筆記本，有著馬尾的女孩忘記的。她大概會想要回去。

en: Should I get the notebook for her?
zh_TW: 我應該幫她取回筆記本嗎？

en: Then, when you find it, please don't look through it.
zh_TW: 那麼，找到的時候，拜託不要讀它。

en: Good luck finding another key to the club room.
zh_TW: 祝妳順利找到另一把社辦鑰匙。

en: Here's the key. I expect it back at some point.
zh_TW: 鑰匙給妳。我期待妳會還給我。

en: Well, you brought my notebook so...
zh_TW: 妳把筆記本給我了，所以…

en: Here you go, I guess. Please don't break anything.
zh_TW: 拿去吧。拜託不要弄壞東西。

en: And don't forget to bring it back to me.
There's a bunch of useless trash in here...
Aha! This little box may be it.
zh_TW: 哈！這小盒子可能就是了。

en: There's three runes... but the ritual didn't mention a specific one.
zh_TW: 有三顆符石…可是儀式沒有提到要哪一顆。

en: A rune. The ritual calls for it.
How is this any less childish than the game we were playing...?
zh_TW: 這跟我們的遊戲比起來沒有比較幼稚…？

en: There's a golden envelope in the drawer.
These are the instructions for the ritual I'm doing.
zh_TW: 這是我要做的儀式的說明。

en: Thankfully, I shortened them when I wrote my notes.
zh_TW: 慶幸的是，我在寫下筆記時把它縮短了。

en:
- 3 dark, adjacent rooms
- 12 candles
- A lighter or matches
zh_TW:
- 3 間黑暗、相連的房間
- 12 根蠟燭
- 打火機或是火柴

en:
- A rune
- A tuft of human hair
- White chalk or white paint
zh_TW:
- 一顆符石
- 一束人髮
- 白粉筆或是白漆

en:
Start after the sun has set.
All 3 rooms must be pitch black; turn off all the lights, draw the curtains, and close the doors.
zh_TW:
在日落後開始。
3 間房間都必須一片漆黑；關掉所有的燈、關上窗簾、並關上大門。

en: Using the chalk or paint, draw a path going through the 3 rooms. This path will serve to connect your current location to your destination.
zh_TW: 使用粉筆或是油漆，畫出一條通過 3 個房間的路徑。這條路徑將做為你連接現在地點與目的地的連結。

en: In the middle room, place 6 candles on each side of the drawn path, parallel to it.
zh_TW: 在中間的房間，放置 6 根蠟燭在路徑兩側，與之平行。

en: Light each of the candles and let them burn for at least 5 minutes. From this point, you can no longer abort the ritual.
zh_TW: 點燃各個蠟燭並讓它們至少燃燒 5 分鐘。從此刻起，你將無法中止儀式。

en:
After the 5 minutes have passed, burn the tuft of hair on one of the candles.
Proceed to blow out all the candles one by one.
zh_TW:
5 分鐘過後，使用其中一根蠟燭燒掉髮束。
接著把蠟燭一根一根吹滅。

en: When the last candle is put out, quickly close your eyes and count to 100.
zh_TW: 當最後一根蠟燭熄滅後，快速閉上眼睛並數到 100。

en: You must always close the door behind you. Leaving it open may attract unwanted attention.
zh_TW: 你必須關上你身後的門。避免不必要的注意。

en: Do NOT let the rune out of your possession. It is your only protection.
zh_TW: 不要讓符石離開你的手邊。它是你唯一的保護。

en: Do NOT bring any weapons with you. If you arm yourself, so will they.
zh_TW: 不要攜帶任何武器。如果你有武器，祂們也會有。

en: Should anything be heard or felt while you count to 100, it must be ignored.
zh_TW: 如果有任何事情在你數到 100 之間發生，忽略它。

en: Do NOT turn on the lights.
It is normal to feel like you are not alone. You won't be.
zh_TW: 感到不是一個人是很正常的。因為你不是。

en: There's no need to read it again.
Is that the ritual we're doing right now?
zh_TW: 這是我們要做的儀式嗎？

en: I wonder if anyone else tried it...
zh_TW: 不知道有沒有其他人試過…

en: Probably not. It was sealed when I got to it.
zh_TW: 應該沒有。我拿到的時候它是密封的。

en: That's weird. Did they think it was cursed?
zh_TW: 奇怪了。他們覺得這被詛咒了嗎？

en: Maybe. I should probably glue it back later.
zh_TW: 可能吧。我等等應該把他黏回去。

en: This window doesn't need any curtains.
zh_TW: 這扇窗戶不需要任何窗簾。

en: Why are you holding that like some sort of sick trophy? What is wrong with you!?
zh_TW: 為什麼你要像是握著獎盃一樣拿著它？你有什麼毛病！？

en: (It's too late to put it back...)
(I can't give it back yet, I haven't even used it!)
zh_TW: (我還不能還回去，我根本還沒用它！)

en: Uhh... why do you have that?
Well, thanks for returning it, I guess?
Let me guess. Returning my notebook was too much for you, so you just took the key instead.
zh_TW: 讓我猜猜。把我的筆記本拿給我太麻煩了，所以妳就直接拿走鑰匙。

en: Well, at least you brought it back, I suppose.
zh_TW: 好吧，至少妳把它拿回來了。

en: Oh wow. You just took that?
zh_TW: 喔哇。妳就直接把它拿走了？

en: You're a real bitch Kat, you know that?
zh_TW: 妳真的很討人厭凱特，妳知道嗎？

en: ...of course you had it all along.
Now I feel like an idiot for worrying. Hope you enjoyed my key.
zh_TW: 現在我覺得像笨蛋一樣白擔心了。享受我的鑰匙吧。
這樣不會有什麼好後果。

en: (I feel like setting her on fire but... I'll control myself.)
zh_TW: (我好想在她身上放火…我得控制我自己)

en: (It would be a shame to set such pretty hair on fire.)
zh_TW: (把這麼漂亮的頭髮燒了會很可惜。)

en: Yeah, that's it. I hope you didn't look through it.
zh_TW: 是啊，沒錯。我希望妳沒有看過它。

en: Of course you looked. Hope you at least solved some of the exercises.
zh_TW: 妳果然看過了。希望妳至少解了一些題目。

en: What? Did you really think I'd leave my personal journal in your hands?
zh_TW: 什麼？妳真的以為我會把我的日記交到妳手上嗎？

en: Well, a promise is a promise anyways.
Here's the key. Bring it back when you're done with it.
zh_TW: 鑰匙拿去。用完了要還給我。

en: Yeah, that's it. But, you don't need the key anymore, do you?
zh_TW: 對，就是這個。但是，妳不需要鑰匙了吧？

en: Why did you bother stealing it if you were gonna get me the notebook either way?
zh_TW: 既然妳要給我筆記本為什麼還要偷它？

en: I uh... I don't seem to have the key with me.
I could've sworn I had it... I'm sorry. I promise to let you use it tomorrow!
zh_TW: 我記得我有啊…對不起。我明天一定會讓妳用它！

en: It's fine! Don't worry about it!
Do you seriously think I'll give you the key after what you did?
zh_TW: 妳真的覺得妳幹出這事後我會給妳鑰匙嗎？

en: Piss off, Kat. And give me that!
zh_TW: 快滾，凱特。還有把它給我！

en: You don't even care? Whatever. Give me that!
zh_TW: 妳根本就不在乎？隨便。把它給我！

en: You come here, you ruin our game, you cut our hair, you steal my things and now you just bring me this?
zh_TW: 妳到這裡，妳毀了我們的遊戲，妳剪掉我們的頭髮，妳偷了我的東西，然後現在妳把這個給我？

en: I have no words left for you, you little sociopath.
zh_TW: 我無話可說了，妳這神經病。

en: Does this happen to be yours?
Huh? Why do you have that? Are you going through my stuff now?
zh_TW: 蛤？妳為什麼拿著它？妳在翻我的東西嗎？

en: Nah... I just had a feeling.
Your feeling is right. May I have my notebook back?
zh_TW: 妳的直覺是對的。我可以拿回我的筆記本嗎？

en: Are you kidding me? First the hair and now blackmail?
zh_TW: 開什麼玩笑？一開始是頭髮然後是勒索？

en: I don't care what you want, and I don't care why you have my notebook.
zh_TW: 我才不管妳想要什麼，我也不想知道妳為什麼有我的筆記本。

en: Give it back or I'll get the teacher to beat your ass tomorrow morning!
zh_TW: 把它還來不然明天早上找老師來教訓妳！

en: Geez... Stuff it. I don't want your stupid notebook.
zh_TW: 唉呀…算了。我不想要妳的蠢筆記本。

en: For the love of... give me that!
What are you doing...? Please bring that here.
zh_TW: 妳在做什麼…？請把它拿過來。

en: For the love of... bring that here!
What are you doing...? Please bring that here.
zh_TW: 妳在做什麼…？請把它拿過來。

en: (I already got all the hair I need, no need to be petty.)
zh_TW: (我已經拿到我需要的頭髮了，不需要這麼小氣。)

en: Are you kidding me right now!?
DON'T TOUCH HER! GET OUT OF HERE!
(I don't need to do that. Plus, I kinda like her hair - it's a pretty color.)
zh_TW: (我不需要那麼做。而且，我還滿喜歡她的頭髮的-顏色很漂亮。)

en: WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING TO HER!?
Kat, if you touch me with those scissors...
zh_TW: 凱特，如果妳對我用了那把剪刀…

en: (She looks like she's asking for it, but I already have all the hair I need.)
zh_TW: (她看起來像是自找麻煩，但是我已經有了需要的頭髮了。)

en: (What if I accidentally push the bag off the chair?)
zh_TW: (如果我不小心把書包推下椅子呢？)

en: I'm so sorry! Oh dear me, let me pick that up for you!
zh_TW: 我很抱歉！看我笨手笨腳的，讓我幫妳把它撿起來！

en: I'll be out of your hair now!
(No need to mess with it anymore.)
An empty chair with no bag on it.
It's the box for the game the girls were playing.
zh_TW: 這是女孩們剛剛在玩的遊戲的盒子。

en: It says "Wiji Game Board - for 2 to 4 players. Get answers from beyond!".
zh_TW: 上面寫著"通靈遊戲盤 - 2 至 4 人。得到來自另一個世界的答案！"。

en: "WARNING: We take no responsibility for any adverse effects playing this game could cause to you or your loved ones."
zh_TW: "警告：我們不為任何遊戲對您或您親人造成的不良影響負責。"

en: The disappointment was your fault, though...
zh_TW: 是妳讓我們很失望的欸…

en: (A spellbook? It looks weird. And it also looks fake.)
zh_TW: (魔法書？看起來很奇怪。而且還看起來很假。)

en: There's a book entitled "Creepy Cryptids and where to find them".
zh_TW: 其中一本的標題是"詭異生物與牠們的產地"。

en: There's a book entitled "The truth behind mermaids exposed".
zh_TW: 其中一本的標題是"美人魚的真相曝光"。

en: There's a book entitled "Magic Circles for simpletons".
zh_TW: 其中一本的標題是"傻瓜也能懂的魔法陣"。

en: Cardboard boxes marked with a symbol. They're sealed with tape.
zh_TW: 印著標誌的紙盒。它被膠帶封起來了。

en: (The runes my friend mentioned may be in here, but I need a way to open it.)
zh_TW: (我朋友提到的符石可能就在裡面，可是我需要想辦法打開它。)

en: (I need a way to open this, I'm not going to carry the entire box around.)
zh_TW: (得想辦法打開它，我不想帶著箱子到處跑。)

en: (There are two runes left in the box, but I only need one for the ritual.)
zh_TW: (箱子裡還剩兩顆符石，可是我只需要一顆來完成儀式。)

en: (But maybe I picked the wrong one...)
Well, it doesn't say I CAN'T have more than one.
zh_TW: 其實，也沒有說我不能多拿幾個。

en: We could get one each. Not that they do anything.
zh_TW: 我們就可以一人拿一顆。不過大概也沒什麼用。
沒有什麼有用的東西了。

en: I need to get this open...

zh_TW: 嗯…妳知道什麼是指甲嗎？

en: Man... is this your idea of fun?
zh_TW: 唉呀…這是妳們取樂的方法嗎？

en: It doesn't matter. Now let's see...
My fabulous masterpiece is displayed here.
zh_TW: 我的大師傑作展示於此。

en: But it's too dark to see now.
A crystal ball resting on a cushion.
(Wow, that cheap plastic exterior really makes it look authentic.)
zh_TW: (哇，這塑膠外殼看起來就像真的一樣。)

en: (I don't see a keyhole, so it must be stuck somehow.)
zh_TW: (我找不到鑰匙孔，所以一定是被卡住了。)
沒有什麼有用的東西了。

en: Don't even bother sitting with us after you ruined our night.
zh_TW: 毀了我們的夜晚還想坐在旁邊啊。

en: Can't you read the room? We don't want you around. Leave!
zh_TW: 會不會看氣氛啊？我們不想看到妳。走開！

en: A spherical model of the Earth. Red crosses mark certain locations.
zh_TW: 圓球狀的地球模型。紅色的叉叉標記了一些地點。

en: Some books and jars filled with.... something.
zh_TW: 一些書本和罐子，裡面裝著…某種東西。

en: There's no need to mess with the lights anymore.
zh_TW: 不需要再動電燈開關了。

en: Some small plants. Their quiet existence fascinates you.
zh_TW: 小植物。他們寂靜的存在令我著迷。

en: Suspicious news articles and posters representing magic circles.
zh_TW: 可疑的新聞報導和有著魔法陣的海報。

en: No need to turn it on again.
A trash can. It seems to be full.
There's a certain level of desperation needed for someone to dig through the trash. You're not at that level.
zh_TW: 翻遍垃圾需要有著某種程度的決心。妳還沒到那個程度。

en: A cool breeze blows in from outside.
I can't seem to open it...
Are you trying to freak us out on purpose?
(These curtains are very thin. I don't think they would work.)
zh_TW: (那些簾布太薄了。我不認為有用。)

en: (Better read my notes to make sure I'm not forgetting anything in this room before leaving.)
zh_TW: (最好在離開前再讀一次我的筆記以免忘了什麼東西。)
